title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 490.2 - Definition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 490.2 - Definition

State Regulations
A residence for adults is an adult care facility
established and operated for the purpose of providing long-term residential
care, room, board, housekeeping, case management, activities and supervision to
five or more adults, unrelated to the operator, who are unable or substantially
unable to live independently. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
490.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
